article:
The '1980–81 Football League Cup' was the twenty-first season of the
Football League Cup, a knockout competition for England's top 92 football clubs.
The competition started on the 8th August 1980 and ended with the final replay
on 1 April 1981.

The final was contested by First Division team Liverpool and Second Division
West Ham United at Wembley Stadium in London and replayed at Villa Park.
